text: innum, (napiye!) Avarkalil (cilar) oru viyaparattaiyo, allatu oru vetikkaiyaiyo, kantal, atanpal avarkal cenru vitukinranar. Melum, ninra vanname um'mai vittuvitukinranar, "allahvitattil iruppatu, vetikkaiyai vitavum viyaparattai vitavum mikavum melanatakum, melum allah unavalippavarkalil mikavum melanavan" enru (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka
